184.title: "Fantagraphics Sues Ex-Comics Journal Editor : New Job at KSP Takes Sobocinski Across Country, with Lawsuit Pending"
184.author: JMC
184.appears_in: p. 11-15 in The Comics Journal, no. 161 (Aug. 1993)
notes: Summary: Describes tenure of Carole Sobocinski as editor at Fantagraphics, and the roles of Doug Ogg, Jeremy Pinkham, Gary Groth at Fantagraphics and Denis Kitchen of Kitchen Sink Press especially regarding coverage of the Kitchen Sink purchase of Tundra.
Written by Mike Catron, cf. editorial in same issue.
